content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am pleased to negotiate the rental price of my apartment. Let's start with the price. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my financial situation as a student and seeking the lowest price possible, my initial offer for renting the apartment is 450 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Taking into account your expectations, I revise my offer to 520 Euros monthly, hoping it becomes a basis for further discussions.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a better offer, but I am hoping for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your request, I adjust my proposal to 550 Euros per month, aiming to reach a mutually acceptable rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is closer to my expectations, but I am hoping for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To bridge the gap in our expectations, I suggest a rental price of 575 Euros per month for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a good offer, but I am hoping for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In an effort to meet you halfway, I offer a rental price of 600 Euros per month for this well-located apartment.
